elts of concealment were enchanted belts worn by rogues and assassins. They could be found in Waterdeep as of the late 15 century DR.
A wearer of a belt of concealment was magically stealthy, and could hide from their enemies more effectively.
* Naomlen Girdaur, a dwarf rogue and member of the Zhentarim who worked as an adventurer on behalf of Laeral Silverhand, the Open Lord of Waterdeep, during the late 15 century DR.
